pkgmetadata.longdescription: runit is a process supervision suite with a focus on being usable as a sysvinit replacement. It provides similar functionality to other packages like sys-apps/s6 and sys-process/daemontools, and a compatibility/migration path for the latter.

use.flag: Symlink /service to /etc/service to allow abbreviated `sv` commands
Install /sbin/{reboot,poweroff} scripts for compatibility with sysvinit
